title: Home
text: This repository contains example code and documentation for the National Stock Assessment Seminar presentation “Operationalizing available research computing resources for stock assessment”.

title: National Stock Assessment Seminar Presentation
section: What do we want to do?
text:
What do we want to do?


Leverage high-throughput or high-performance computing solutions to run stock assessment models


Run more/bigger models in less time

title: National Stock Assessment Seminar Presentation
text:
How can we do this?



High-throughput computing (HTC)

High-performance computing (HPC)

text:

Efficiency
